document_data.name: Delver's plate
document_data.mainbody: '''''Delver's Plate''''' was a suit of [[plate mail]] armor, worn by the great [[Waterdhavian]] general, [[Delver Kinlake]].
document_data.Powers: This ''+2 heavy plate mail'' granted the wearer limited protection from [[magic]]al [[spell]]s and abilities.
document_data.History:
''Delver's plate'' was originally granted to the vagabond general by [[Lords of Waterdeep|Open Lord]] [[Baeron Silmaeril]], as a token of appreciation for his years of service and leadership to the city. After Delver passed away the magnificent suit of armor was passed to eldest son.

Since then it was worn by by a number of adventurers and, by the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]], came into the possession of [[DigDag]], an [[orc]] chieftain.
